channel.title: [474] Vulcan - Bringing the past back
channel.description:
[ul][center] [size=18pt][i][b]About us[/b][/i]:[/size] [size=12pt]Well i'm starting Vulcan 474 because I miss the old times of old RuneScape. I chose the 474 revision because on of the most popular pking item is the godsword and this is pretty much right before RuneScape went to total shit. The server will be based of rs2-474(Hyperion) by Scu11 and Vastico, the reason I have selected this source is because of the amazing combat and it has a good layout for the mini game system. I will try to emulate all old RuneScape stuff along with some custom content(mini games & bosses).[/size] [size=18pt][b]Media:[/b][/size] [img]http://screensnapr.com/e/IvqyLv.png[/img] [img]http://screensnapr.com/e/WmsssL.png[/img] [img]http://screensnapr.com/e/EUSaLR.png[/img] [img]http://screensnapr.com/e/na3jbn.png[/img] [img]http://screensnapr.com/e/el0zXp.png[/img] [img]http://screensnapr.com/e/FZJ2sF.png[/img] [size=18pt][b]Developers:[/b][/size] [size=12pt]Vulcan/Kusterbeck[/size] [size=18pt][b][i]Credits:[/i][/b][/size] [size=12pt]Graham - Hyperion Blake - Hyperion Brett - Hyperion Scu11 - Rs2-474 Vastico - Rs2-474 Scar - Rs2-474 Sir Sean [/size] [/center] [list][li]Server Developer[list] [li]Create content[list] [li]Create skills[/li] [li]Create minigames[/li] [li]Fix bugs[/li] [/list][/li] [/list][/li] [li]Website Developer[list] [li]Create websites[list] [li]Front pages[/li] [li]Forum section etc[/li] [/list][/li] [li]Website templates[list] [li]Custom skins[/li] [li]Splash pages[/li] [/list][/li] [/list][/li] [li]Graphic's Artist[list] [li]Banners[list] [li]Good clean banners[/li] [li]Animated backgrounds[/li] [/list][/li] [li]Backgrounds[list] [li]Design website colour schemes[/li] [/list][/li] [/list][/li] [/list] [b][i][size=12pt]Server Developer Application:[/size][/i][/b]
[list] [li]Name:[/li] [li]Applying for:[/li] [li]Experience:[/li] [li]Msn/Skype:[/li] [li]Previous work:[/li] [/list]

Looks great, tho many 474 remakes are out, I like this, I support.
[/quote]
That statement is complete bull shit. Moparscape and any other RsPs community is flooded with Hybrid Pvp sources and edits of that meaning 317 server loading 562+ cache. There are barely any 474 hyperion remake of old rs out.
OT: I support this 100%. I hope to God you stay with this project. Great job![/quote]

can i help[/quote]
